# ontario-card-collection

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute       | Description                                                                           | Type          | Default |
| ------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- | ------- |
| `cardsPerRow` | `cards-per-row` | The number of cards to display per row. If no number is passed, it will default to 3. | `2 \| 3 \| 4` | `3`     |
